Comments_List: Professor Purdy Moudarres provided an exceptionally well constructed literary trajectory through many stories featuring the women that have become archetypes for Western Culture.

A major strength of this course is Professor Purdy Moudarres' commitment to compelling, relevant, rigorous scholarship, as well as her sincere interest in soliciting and implementing ongoing feedback from students.
